requirements.summary: Create interactive colored tiles game interface
acceptanceCriteria: Game displays interactive colored elements that respond to clicks/taps
Multiple colors are used in the game interface

file_operations.description: Create a reusable ColorTile component that renders an interactive colored button/tile with click handlers and visual feedback
Create GameBoard component that manages the grid/layout of colored tiles and handles the game interface structure

requirements.summary: Implement tap validation and game logic
acceptanceCriteria: Game responds to user taps/clicks on colored elements
Game provides feedback on whether taps are correct or incorrect

file_operations.description: Create custom hook that manages game state, generates color sequences, validates player taps against the correct pattern, and provides feedback mechanisms
Integrate useGameLogic hook to wire tap validation, provide visual/textual feedback for correct/incorrect taps, and manage game flow

acceptanceCriteria: Score increments when player makes correct taps

file_operations.description: Create ScoreDisplay component that shows the current score with vibrant styling
Add score tracking logic that increments on successful taps and exposes current score state
Wire ScoreDisplay component into the game interface to show real-time score updates

acceptanceCriteria: Leaderboard shows multiple top scores in descending order

file_operations.description: Create Leaderboard component that fetches and displays top scores from backend using the getLeaderboard method, showing names and scores in descending order
Create custom hook that manages leaderboard data fetching from backend.getLeaderboard() and handles loading/error states
Create GameOverModal component that appears when game ends, allows player to submit their name and score using backend.submitScore(), and displays the leaderboard
Add game-over state detection and expose game completion status to trigger the GameOverModal
Wire GameOverModal to appear when game ends and integrate Leaderboard visibility in the game interface

requirements.summary: Apply vibrant, playful visual design with animations
acceptanceCriteria: Game uses a cohesive color palette with bright, saturated colors
UI elements have consistent styling with rounded corners and playful typography
Interactions include smooth transitions and animations

file_operations.description: Define global CSS custom properties for vibrant color palette (primary, secondary, accent colors), set playful typography with rounded font families, and establish base animation timing functions
Extend Tailwind theme with custom colors matching the vibrant palette, configure rounded shape defaults, and add animation utilities for smooth transitions
Apply rounded corners, vibrant background colors, and smooth scale/opacity transitions on hover and tap interactions
Style with bold, playful typography and bright colors, add smooth number transition animations when score updates
Apply consistent vibrant styling with rounded containers, playful typography for player names and scores, and smooth fade-in animations
Style modal with vibrant colors, rounded corners, playful button designs, and smooth slide-in/fade animations on appearance
